message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it could really be valuable for you, and this price reflects its worth.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
